response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me and I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. After careful consideration, I propose to offer it to you at a special price of $1,350,000. This represents a substantial saving compared to its intrinsic worth, providing you with an excellent opportunity to secure a high-quality asset at a favorable rate. I look forward to your response and the possibility of discussing the details further.", "product_price": 1350000}
